paragraphs.body: The constellations on the star chart aided in ${link_0}'s navigation of the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: The constellations on the star chart aided in Team Avatar's navigation of the Si Wong Desert.

paragraphs.body: The star chart was a map of stars and constellations found within ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: The star chart was a map of stars and constellations found within Wan Shi Tong's Library.

paragraphs.body: During ${link_0}'s exploration of ${link_1}'s Library in 100 ${link_2}, Sokka pocketed many books and scrolls he found interesting or potentially useful, including a map and the star chart.
paragraphs.text: During Team Avatar's exploration of Wan Shi Tong's Library in 100 AG, Sokka pocketed many books and scrolls he found interesting or potentially useful, including a map and the star chart.

paragraphs.body: After escaping from the library and losing ${link_0}, the scroll proved useful in guiding the group through the ${link_1} at night. As the desert had no known landmarks nearby, ${link_2} used the star chart to navigate them through the barren landscape.
paragraphs.text: After escaping from the library and losing Appa, the scroll proved useful in guiding the group through the Si Wong Desert at night. As the desert had no known landmarks nearby, Katara used the star chart to navigate them through the barren landscape.
